**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 278 1.1 **Price** 10,000 gp **Usage** worn armor **Bulk** 4 **Base Armor** [Full Plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=50) --- This suit of _+2 [greater resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2786) [dragonhide](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3269) [full plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=50)_ makes you look like a fearsome dragon. The armor comes in many different varieties depending on the type of dragon from which it's made, though they usually conform to the four magical traditions. **Activate—Dragon Breath** ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645)) **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** You unleash a 15-foot cone of energy with a damage type and saving throw corresponding to the tradition of the dragon used to make the armor (shown on the table below). The cone deals 14d6 damage; each creature in the area must attempt a DC 36 basic saving throw ##
Dragon Tradition
Damage
ArcaneForce (Reflex)
DivineSpirit (Reflex)
OccultMental (Will)
PrimalPoison (Fortitude)
 **Craft Requirements** The initial raw materials must include 1,250 gp of dragonhide.
